contest-event.event-date: Oct. 15, 1960 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Three Figures Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Herbert Howells was appointed referee. The Baton of Honour was given to Frank Wright.
